item.title: Majority of Manhole covers have sunken, 5th April
item.description:
Majority of drain manhole covers in Finlay Way are sunken resulting in excessive road noise, vibration to nearby properties and impacting the local community with interrupted sleep and potential damage to nearby proerties
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Finlay Way, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Debris either side of the road crossing, 5th April
item.description:
Where the road has been widened the area either side of the island is not being cleaned, in general along Finlay Way, resulting in loose chippings and other stones damaging the carriageway. The road sweeper seems to avoid doing these area's!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Bramble Chase, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trench has been filled and has sunken, 5th April
item.description:
A trench has been dug some months ago has sunken at the curb edge and may be causing damage to vehicle suspension and vibration to nearby houses cause by large lorries and other traffic. There is also some sunken drain covers in the area
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bramble Chase, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sunken metal cover, 4th April
item.description:
The metal cover over a small access channel has fallen in and partially broken. Not sure if it is for water or telecoms. It's right in centre of pavement and could be dangerous to walkers and etc

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 84, Reddings Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 4th April
item.description:
2 HOUR WITH GIVE AN TAKE PLEASE BRING X4 1 METER BARRIERS OUT AN PLACE AROUND DAMAGED SUNKEN WATER METER PLUS X4 SANDBAGS AND PUT AROUND DEFECT TO MAKE SAFE (Damaged Street Furniture)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree in front of stile on footpath, 4th April
item.description:
Someone plant a tree in worst place as it’s in front of footpath next to stile. Is anywhere to move to more appropriate place rather then in the place where people and dogs walks and difficult to get access to the footpath.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Elmbridge, Gloucester
